heroes.name: Mars
heroes.description: Surrounded by two moons, Phobos and Deimos. It's made of about 95% of carbon dioxide, 3% nitrogen and 1.6% argon.

heroes.name: Moon
heroes.description: To the Earth it only has one face. It's made of oxygen and silicon.

heroes.name: Antares
heroes.description: 550 lightyears away from Earth in the constellation of Scorpius. It's made of hydrogen and helium.
